post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, February 25
post.Content:
Here's what happened in the last week - enjoy! :-)

  • Bruno Borges has open sourced a JavaFX starter project on GitHub that works with Gradle and Jlink (and Java 11+).
  • JFX Days in Dortmund was announced for early June.
  • binjr has open sourced a time series data browser.
  • Zeppel Software has open sourced a library for creating chat bubbles in JavaFX.
  • Peter Rogge has updated lib-fxml, his library that allows the developer to load JavaFX relevant files (.fxml, .css, .properties) and connect them to a controller.
